Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 16 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. The survey is not part of any market research, we are interested in measuring public opinion.
I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means you will not be identifiable in any of the published results. {#CONSENT_ins}
If you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purpose for processing your personal data as well as your data protection rights.
For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded.
INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: HOW DID YOU GET MY NUMBER: Your telephone number has been randomly generated by a computer, like all numbers we dial for this research. Our aim is to interview a representative sample of this country’s population.
CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues.
WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: We use your phone number to invite you to take part in this interview and for quality control purposes only. Gender and age information will be collected, as well as personal data from the replies to the interview questions (such as marital status). All of the information you provide will remain confidential, your answers will be combined with all other participants’ answers, and no identifiable data will be shared with Ipsos’ client.
Are you happy to proceed with the interview? {#Birthday_ins}

(WHEN SPEAKING TO THE TARGETED RESPONDENT) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting decision makers in companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means that neither you, nor your business, will be identifiable in any of the published results. For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public and business opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues. WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: No personal data will be collected during this interview. Your participation, together with your individual responses to the questions, will be kept strictly confidential. If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com Are you happy to proceed with the interview? (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

(WHEN SPEAKING TO THE TARGETED RESPONDENT) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means that neither you, nor your business, will be identifiable in any of the published results. For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded. Your participation, together with your individual responses to the questions, will be kept strictly confidential. If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com Are you happy to proceed with the interview? Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE). May I speak with someone with decision making responsibilities (managing director, general manager, CEO, financial director) or someone leading the commercial activities (commercial manger, sales manager, marketing manager) or a legal officer in your company? (IF THE GATEKEEPER ASKS FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION) I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting (decision makers in) companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would greatly appreciate being able to speak with him or her to include his/her opinion in the study. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for a European public institution. I can only reveal the name of this institution during the interview. WHO TO CONTACT ABOUT THE SURVEY: If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)
